mapper.sql: id, booking_no, booking_date, arrived_date, state_flag, customer_id, customer_no, customer_name, customer_type, buyer, customer_email, supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_no, supplier_type, model_type, origin, destination, pick_up_no, pick_up_user, pick_up_tel, pick_up_address, pick_up_remark, delivery_name, delivery_tel, delivery_address, delivery_remark, hg_type, contract_no, currency_name, is_hg, hg_truck_book_id, hg_truck_id, hg_truck_no, f_multi_levei0, f_datetime, check_state_flag, f_level, f_step, remark, overseas_customers_id, overseas_customers, receiving_id, receiving_no, customer_relation_id, supplier_relation_id, arfee_id, deputy_style, incoterms, pay_fee_style, pay_fee_day, re_fee_style, re_fee_day, account_type, interest, balance_day, insurance, f_rate, bg_rate, hg_rate, arrived_rate, invoice_rate, rece_rate, account_rate, goods_rate, convert_rate, appoint_hg_rate, composite_fee, proxy_fee, composite_proxy_fee, fsales_id, fsales_name, follower_id, follower_name, yfee, bfee, earnest_per, inv_remark, is_lowest_price, inv_customer_id, inv_customer_name, product_class, bill_id, bill_style, is_hs_status, make_by, make_by_name, make_dtm, purchase_contract_no, sales_contract_no, origin_area, hk_co_id, hk_co_name, hk_co_name_en, hk_co_address, hk_co_address_en, hk_co_relationer, hk_co_tel, hk_co_email, hk_co_fax, hg_currency_name, is_urgent, min_fees_no, is_sync, onl_id, onl_no, print_num, is_jiaji, purchaseid, purchasename, saleid, salename, hub_no, custom_master, distinate_port, port, trade_country, trade_area_code, desp_port_code, goods_place, is_us_payment, is_confirm, so_num, consignee_code, consignee_address, consignee_tel, container_type, consignee_name, transportation_type, crt_by, crt_by_name, crt_by_dtm, mdy_by, mdy_by_name, mdy_by_dtm, voided, voided_by, voided_by_name, voided_by_dtm
mapper.select:
select t.`id`,t.`booking_no`,t.`booking_date`,t.`arrived_date`,t.`state_flag`,t.`customer_id`,t.`customer_no`,t.`customer_name`,t.`customer_type`,t.`buyer`,t.`customer_email`,t.`supplier_id`,t.`supplier_name`,t.`supplier_no`,t.`supplier_type`,t.`model_type`,t.`origin`,t.`destination`,t.`pick_up_no`,t.`pick_up_user`,t.`pick_up_tel`,t.`pick_up_address`,t.`pick_up_remark`,t.`delivery_name`,t.`delivery_tel`,t.`delivery_address`,t.`delivery_remark`,t.`hg_type`,t.`contract_no`,t.`currency_name`,t.`is_hg`,t.`hg_truck_book_id`,t.`hg_truck_id`,t.`hg_truck_no`,t.`f_multi_levei0`,t.`f_datetime`,t.`check_state_flag`,t.`f_level`,t.`f_step`,t.`remark`,t.`overseas_customers_id`,t.`overseas_customers`,t.`receiving_id`,t.`receiving_no`,t.`customer_relation_id`,t.`supplier_relation_id`,t.`arfee_id`,t.`deputy_style`,t.`incoterms`,t.`pay_fee_style`,t.`pay_fee_day`,t.`re_fee_style`,t.`re_fee_day`,t.`account_type`,t.`interest`,t.`balance_day`,t.`insurance`,t.`f_rate`,t.`bg_rate`,t.`hg_rate`,t.`arrived_rate`,t.`invoice_rate`,t.`rece_rate`,t.`account_rate`,t.`goods_rate`,t.`convert_rate`,t.`appoint_hg_rate`,t.`composite_fee`,t.`proxy_fee`,t.`composite_proxy_fee`,t.`fsales_id`,t.`fsales_name`,t.`follower_id`,t.`follower_name`,t.`yfee`,t.`bfee`,t.`earnest_per`,t.`inv_remark`,t.`is_lowest_price`,t.`inv_customer_id`,t.`inv_customer_name`,t.`product_class`,t.`bill_id`,t.`bill_style`,t.`is_hs_status`,t.`make_by`,t.`make_by_name`,t.`make_dtm`,t.`purchase_contract_no`,t.`sales_contract_no`,t.`origin_area`,t.`hk_co_id`,t.`hk_co_name`,t.`hk_co_name_en`,t.`hk_co_address`,t.`hk_co_address_en`,t.`hk_co_relationer`,t.`hk_co_tel`,t.`hk_co_email`,t.`hk_co_fax`,t.`hg_currency_name`,t.`is_urgent`,t.`min_fees_no`,t.`is_sync`,t.`onl_id`,t.`onl_no`,t.`print_num`,t.`is_jiaji`,t.`purchaseid`,t.`purchasename`,t.`saleid`,t.`salename`,t.`hub_no`,t.`custom_master`,t.`distinate_port`,t.`port`,t.`trade_country`,t.`trade_area_code`,t.`desp_port_code`,t.`goods_place`,t.`is_us_payment`,t.`is_confirm`,t.`so_num`,t.`consignee_code`,t.`consignee_address`,t.`consignee_tel`,t.`container_type`,t.`consignee_name`,t.`transportation_type`,t.`crt_by`,t.`crt_by_name`,t.`crt_by_dtm`,t.`mdy_by`,t.`mdy_by_name`,t.`mdy_by_dtm`,t.`voided`,t.`voided_by`,t.`voided_by_name`,t.`voided_by_dtm` from booking_order t where 1=1 and t.voided = 0
and t.`booking_no` like concat('%',#{form.bookingNo},'%')
and t.model_type = #{form.modelType}
and t.`id` in (select id from v_bookOrder)

select t.`id`,t.`booking_no`,t.`booking_date`,t.`arrived_date`,t.`state_flag`,t.`customer_id`,t.`customer_no`,t.`customer_name`,t.`customer_type`,t.`buyer`,t.`customer_email`,t.`supplier_id`,t.`supplier_name`,t.`supplier_no`,t.`supplier_type`,t.`model_type`,t.`origin`,t.`destination`,t.`pick_up_no`,t.`pick_up_user`,t.`pick_up_tel`,t.`pick_up_address`,t.`pick_up_remark`,t.`delivery_name`,t.`delivery_tel`,t.`delivery_address`,t.`delivery_remark`,t.`hg_type`,t.`contract_no`,t.`currency_name`,t.`is_hg`,t.`hg_truck_book_id`,t.`hg_truck_id`,t.`hg_truck_no`,t.`f_multi_levei0`,t.`f_datetime`,t.`check_state_flag`,t.`f_level`,t.`f_step`,t.`remark`,t.`overseas_customers_id`,t.`overseas_customers`,t.`receiving_id`,t.`receiving_no`,t.`customer_relation_id`,t.`supplier_relation_id`,t.`arfee_id`,t.`deputy_style`,t.`incoterms`,t.`pay_fee_style`,t.`pay_fee_day`,t.`re_fee_style`,t.`re_fee_day`,t.`account_type`,t.`interest`,t.`balance_day`,t.`insurance`,t.`f_rate`,t.`bg_rate`,t.`hg_rate`,t.`arrived_rate`,t.`invoice_rate`,t.`rece_rate`,t.`account_rate`,t.`goods_rate`,t.`convert_rate`,t.`appoint_hg_rate`,t.`composite_fee`,t.`proxy_fee`,t.`composite_proxy_fee`,t.`fsales_id`,t.`fsales_name`,t.`follower_id`,t.`follower_name`,t.`yfee`,t.`bfee`,t.`earnest_per`,t.`inv_remark`,t.`is_lowest_price`,t.`inv_customer_id`,t.`inv_customer_name`,t.`product_class`,t.`bill_id`,t.`bill_style`,t.`is_hs_status`,t.`make_by`,t.`make_by_name`,t.`make_dtm`,t.`purchase_contract_no`,t.`sales_contract_no`,t.`origin_area`,t.`hk_co_id`,t.`hk_co_name`,t.`hk_co_name_en`,t.`hk_co_address`,t.`hk_co_address_en`,t.`hk_co_relationer`,t.`hk_co_tel`,t.`hk_co_email`,t.`hk_co_fax`,t.`hg_currency_name`,t.`is_urgent`,t.`min_fees_no`,t.`is_sync`,t.`onl_id`,t.`onl_no`,t.`print_num`,t.`is_jiaji`,t.`purchaseid`,t.`purchasename`,t.`saleid`,t.`salename`,t.`hub_no`,t.`custom_master`,t.`distinate_port`,t.`port`,t.`trade_country`,t.`trade_area_code`,t.`desp_port_code`,t.`goods_place`,t.`is_us_payment`,t.`is_confirm`,t.`so_num`,t.`consignee_code`,t.`consignee_address`,t.`consignee_tel`,t.`container_type`,t.`consignee_name`,t.`transportation_type`,t.`crt_by`,t.`crt_by_name`,t.`crt_by_dtm`,t.`mdy_by`,t.`mdy_by_name`,t.`mdy_by_dtm`,t.`voided`,t.`voided_by`,t.`voided_by_name`,t.`voided_by_dtm`, f.lowest_price from booking_order t join fee f on t.arfee_id = f.id where 1=1 and t.`id` = #{id}
